page.title: 17THE MOTHERWELL MARATHON
page.content: when asked if she would like to run. Suddenly she shouted, "Dinnae touch him or he'll no ge' 'is medal!" A staggering runner had fallen just before the line. Nobody touched him. {TOM - a Steward Tom's job was to keep the road clear. He had volunteered for his job and started at 9.30am. Although he had never done anything like this before, he enjoyed it very much. He received neither training nor pay. Andy finished in 4hr 50mins, missing his target time by 50mins. This was his second marathon. His three months of training had paid off. Charlie McDougall, who won the 1985 race, emulated A. Bird - the winner of the First Marathon in 1983. But all the runners deserved the medal they each received.
